storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId of the current store the user is interactive/purchasing from.

unverifiedProductIds.title: unverifiedProductIds
unverifiedProductIds.description: The unverified list of product Ids to be checked if they are purchasable for the current store. This input is optional.

unverifiedProducts.title: unverifiedProducts
unverifiedProducts.description: A list of product records that haven't yet been verified to be purchasable on the current store. This input is optional.
